template:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<policy xmlns="http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/policy" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:spring="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:throttling-gw="http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/throttling-gw" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/policy http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/policy/current/mule-policy.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-3.1.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/throttling-gw http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/throttling-gw/current/mule-throttling-gw.xsd" online="true">
  <throttling-gw:policy xmlns:throttling-gw="http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/throttling-gw" enableStatistics="true" notifyEveryExceededRequest="true" id="3">
    <throttling-gw:delay-response delayTimeInMillis="10000" delayAttempts="5"/>
    <throttling-gw:rolling-time-frame-algorithm maximumRequestsPerPeriod="1" timePeriodMillis="120000"/>
  </throttling-gw:policy>
  <before>
    <throttling-gw:throttle xmlns:throttling-gw="http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/throttling-gw" throttling-policy-ref="3"/>
  </before>
  <pointcut>
    <endpoint xmlns="http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/policy" regex="http:\/\/example\.com\/24"/>
  </pointcut>
</policy>
